name: Space Rocks (itch) (WesleyNunes)
description:
Space Rocks

Academic Project made with Construct 2.

Controls:

Up Arrow Key - Accelerate

Left Arrow Key - Turn Left

Right Arrow Key - Turn Right

SPACEBAR - Laser beam

X - Warp to a random position

Game Description:

Destroy all rocks to win, beware of the rocks and UFOs, avoid them so you don't lose.

CREDITS:

Laser Beam sound effect - https://opengameart.org/users/dklon

Trough-Space music - https://opengameart.org/users/maxstack
